abstract: Apollo Management and several other investment firms are in talks to convert their debt holdings in Charter Communications, the troubled cable company, into equity stakes, The New York Times’s Michael J. de la Merced reported, citing people briefed on the negotiations.
lead_paragraph: Apollo Management and several other investment firms are in talks to convert their debt holdings in Charter Communications, the troubled cable company, into equity stakes, The New York Times’s Michael J. de la Merced reported, citing people briefed on the negotiations.

headline.main: Charter in Talks to Give Stakes to Debt Holders
